page.title: 08Harebeating Drive.
page.content: The house is in Harebeating Drive.It is a semi detached,with a long concrete drive and a{large garage.}It has a{glass door}at the side,{french {windows}at the back and{modern windows {at the}front with a criss-cross pattern on them. There is no car in the garage; instead there is dog food and packets of biscuits. In the windows there are ornaments, vases and pots of flowers, in front of net or lace curtains. There are no toys about in the garden or the garage, so the people who live there are either a couple (probably old) or even a person on their own. { { } {
